subject: Football (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A matchup between Alabama and Texas A&M, with Johnny Manziel, has not stopped Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban from doing what he has done best: recruiting.
snippet: A matchup between Alabama and Texas A&M, with Johnny Manziel, has not stopped Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban from doing what he has done best: recruiting.
